meanings.sent1: He miskicked the ball and it went the wrong way.
meanings.sent2: She often miskicked during soccer practice.
meanings.sent3: The clumsy player miskicked the ball into the goal post.
meanings.sent4: His attempt at a goal was ruined when he miskicked the ball.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the miskicked ball echoed across the field.

meanings.sent1: Yesterday, he miskicked the ball during the game.
meanings.sent2: She realized she had miskicked when the ball didn't go far.
meanings.sent3: The team laughed when they saw he had miskicked again.
meanings.sent4: His miskicked shot ended up hitting the referee by accident.
meanings.sent5: The miskicked ball rolled slowly towards the opponent's goal.
